attributes.action: Include Domestics, Housekeepers, and Portering staff in the COVID-19 pay rise.
attributes.additional_details:
I have currently worked the last 20 weeks as a domestic on A&E helping out during these unprecedented times. Myself and other non-clinical staff have placed ourselves on the front line, and have all either put ourselves at risk of getting the disease, or have actually had it ourselves.
Domestics/ Housekeepers and Portering staff are some of the main non-clinical staff who’s jobs include transporting Covid Patients, cleaning their rooms and ensuring the patient gets food and drinks.
attributes.background: The Government should act to ensure that non-clinical staff are seen as valuable and essential members of the NHS. A pay rise for their actions during these difficult times would not only recognise their efforts, but also thank them for the risks they have placed themselves, and there families in.
